pdfthumbnail.description: Create a thumbnail of the pdf and output the URL. If you omit the size specification, an image of the size of the pdf will be created.

attributes.width: The width of the thumbnail to generate.
attributes.height: The height of the thumbnail to generate.
attributes.square: If set to 1 (one) then the thumbnail generated will be square.
attributes.scale: The percentage by which to reduce or increase the size of the current image.
